meta_description: The first shots of the Revolutionary War were fired near The Old Manse. Emerson, Hawthorne and Thoreau spawned a philosophical revolution here.

The Trustees invite you to get out and explore Massachusetts. Go relax on the beach, bike through the woods, have a picnic in the park, or run the kids around!

### Become a Member

Membership in The Trustees opens a world of new experiences, gives access to your favorite places and activities, and lets you give back and get involved.

[ Join Today  ](https://give.thetrustees.org/campaign/web-membership-landing-page/c513181)

### Renew

Show your support for all the special places of Massachusetts by renewing your Membership with The Trustees today.

[ Renew  ](https://give.thetrustees.org/campaign/membership-landing-page/c513181)

### Gift Membership

With a yearlong Membership to the Trustees and more than 120 places to see and experience, they won’t be able to stay inside. Share your love and support of land conservation and the outdoors: your friend or loved one will enjoy the many benefits of a gift of Membership to The Trustees while also helping us to fulfill our mission of protecting and caring for Massachusetts’ special places.

[ Give a Gift  ](https://give.thetrustees.org/campaign/gift-membership-landing-page/c536503)

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

Accessibility

We believe that nature should be welcoming and accessible to all. We are committed to creating experiences that support a wide range of needs, ensuring that our special places can be enjoyed by everyone. Our accessible trails and adaptive equipment at multiple properties, accessible programming and events including sensory-friendly activities, programming with ASL Interpretation are designed to accommodate persons with physical, intellectual, and sensory disabilities. With input and partnership from members of the disability community, we continue to expand access across our properties and programs. Accessibility is an ongoing journey, and we are dedicated to learning, improving, and building spaces where everyone can belong.

on this page

### Accessible Properties

Discover accessible Trustees properties and explore features like adaptive equipment, wheelchair-friendly spaces, sensory-friendly hours, ASL interpretation, and other accommodations available on our properties.

[ Explore  ](https://thetrustees.org/content/how-to-find-accessible-properties/)

### Accessible Trails

Learn more about the accessible and wheelchair-friendly trails we offer.

[ Trails  ](https://thetrustees.org/program/ada-accessible-trails/)

### Accessible Programming

Programs and events with accessibility accommodations or features.
